description: This file declares external functions for interacting with device parameters and retrieving instance numbers, primarily used in the context of broadband device management. It provides function prototypes for getting parameter values of various types and for obtaining instance numbers by index, along with conditional APIs related to VLAN and configuration.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueUlong
methods.description: Retrieves an unsigned long parameter value based on parameter name.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueString
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value given its name, buffer, and size.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueBool
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value based on parameter name.

methods.name: CosaGetInstanceNumberByIndex
methods.description: Gets the instance number of an object by its name and index.
